mapper.select: select r.recruit_corpnum, c.corp_name, recruit_num, recruit_adminnum, recruit_link, recruit_enddate, recruit_jobgroup, recruit_career, recruit_readcount from recruit r left outer join corp c on r.recruit_corpnum = c.corp_num where r.recruit_corpnum in(select cc.corp_num from corp cc where cc.corp_name like '%' || #{corp_name} || '%' )
